entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
